Articles.Content:
BILL & JEB'S

![fA1NDXU.png](https://i.imgur.com/fA1NDXU.png)

EXCELLENT ADVENTURE

Bill & Jeb's Excellent Adventure is a KSP fanfic/Machinomic set in the Kerbal solar system several centuries after the start of the space program. As a result, it has been extensively explored and colonized by public and private organizations and corporations. Bill and Jebediah Kerman decide to apply to become astronauts, but things do not go as planned...

[***Google Docs page***](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B-Ndjrh2zGjKflVFa2lzQW9rMVRYeTZoTFh5NE9VSlBVUkR0UnJ4N0VnMlZDaUJ6Slh6Zkk&usp=sharing)

Episode List

- Episode 1: Rejected
- Episode 2: They Went To Space That Day
- Episode 3: They Make A Big Deal About It
- Episode 4: Retaliation

> 
> **Q: Some of the pictures are inconsistent!**
> 
> Yeah, I often make mistakes, usually due to doing several takes in order to get enough screenshots.
> 
> **Q: This ship couldn't actually fly!**
> 
> I try to make everything look like it could conceivably work IRL, but often I put form over function. Some of the ships don't have much delta-v or are aerodynamically wibbly-wobbly or swooshy-crashy because [spaceplanes just *hate me*.](https://ninenineninefour.tumblr.com/post/72405666401/the-more-i-try-to-build-planes-the-harder-it) Others may be lacking many essential parts because they might be decorative, and my computer can't handle very high part counts.
> 
> **Q: Could you send me a(n) (**[**craft**](http://minecraft.net/)**/**[**flag**](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/fallout/images/6/67/FNV_NCR_Flag.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width/320?cb=20110423115845)**/**[**sprite**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sprite_%28soft_drink%29)**/**[**angel**](https://youtu.be/4l8Wkrb5JNw?t=2m3s)**)?**
> 
> Sure! Just let me know, and I'll throw it on the Google Docs page, so long as you give me credit and use your powers for ^good^ and not *<sub>evil</sub>*.
> 
> **Q: X is a lot like Y from the (book/movie/game/puppet show) "Z"!**
> 
> It may be intentional. I take a lot of inspiration from other media, but if it reminds you of something, feel free to tell me! If it was intentional, I could say why I stole *took inspiration from* the aforementioned book/movie/game/puppet show. And if I've never heard of it before, I'll have learned of something cool and new!
> 
> **Q: How do I shot web?**
> 
> Press F4 and delete system32.
> 
> 

> ![lWQrix2.png](http://i.imgur.com/lWQrix2.png)**Jebediah 'Jeb' Kerman**
> Y'all know Jeb. He's the best and the worst pilot who ever lived.
> 
> ![4GL068V.png](http://i.imgur.com/4GL068V.png)**Bill Kerman**
> 
> Jeb's little brother. Not as brave (stupid) as Jeb, but more intellectual. He is skilled at engineering and navigation.
> 
> ![zYTOfd6.png](https://i.imgur.com/zYTOfd6.png)**Sargent Robert 'Bob' Kerman**
> 
> One of the UNKM's best pilots. Easily annoyed. Probably not related to Bill or Jeb, and if so, very distantly.
> 
> ![HjpNfIO.png](https://i.imgur.com/HjpNfIO.png)**Admiral Gareth**
> 
> A very high-ranking officer in the UNKM. Very serious and kind of a hardass, but not an unreasonable guy.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> *More will be added as the story continues...*
> 

> ![beERbCc.png](https://i.imgur.com/beERbCc.png)
> **United Nations of Kerbin Military**
> 
> The military branch of the United Nations of Kerbin. It merged with the Kerbal Space Program in the year 205 for political reasons, but despite the name, their spacefaring operations mainly focus on exploration.
> 
> ![sTV1bIE.png](https://i.imgur.com/sTV1bIE.png)
> 
> **Hydroxide Labs**
> 
> The largest and oldest private spaceflight corporation. They operate colonies and mining facilities in various locations throughout the solar system and design/build many of the UNKM's ships.
> 
> ![wny6xab.png](https://i.imgur.com/wny6xab.png)
> 
> **Lambda Foundation**
> 
> A nonprofit organization that formed in the year 206 due to the criticism of the Kerbal Space Program's takeover by the military. They are devoted to peaceful exploration and scientific research. However, due to the limited funding, they have not had any noteworthy foothold in the solar system, and mainly get by through selling designs for unmanned probes and rovers to other, larger programs.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> *More will be added as the story continues...*
> 

> 
> **Mods/plugins currently in use:**
> 
> [THREAD=60961]TextureReplacer[/THREAD]
> 
> [THREAD=55657]Kerbal Joint Reinforcement[/THREAD] removed due to docking issues
> 
> [THREAD=96497]PlanetShine[/THREAD] removed because my computer sucks
> 
> [THREAD=80234]TweakScale[/THREAD]
> 
> [THREAD=12384]MechJeb[/THREAD]
> 
> [THREAD=37756]HyperEdit[/THREAD] (because I'm lame)
> 
> [THREAD=107273]UbioZur Welding Ltd.[/THREAD]
> 
> [THREAD=85209]BahamutoD's Bullet Launchers[/THREAD]
> 
>

The use of the Kerbal sprites is amusing.

(Kerbal Sprite Program would be a cool thing to make. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

***Aug. 17, Year 244***

***2:43 pm KST***

***Astronaut Complex, Kerbal Space Center***

![1eq0olH.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/1eq0olH.jpg)

*From left to right: Bill Kerman, Jebediah Kerman, Receptionist*

![5nt1Ow8.png](https://i.imgur.com/5nt1Ow8.png)Yes, IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m sure. It says so right here. Ã¢â‚¬Å“Jebediah Kerman: RejectedÃ¢â‚¬Â. Ã¢â‚¬Å“Bill Kerman: RejectedÃ¢â‚¬Â. Your applications have been rejected. Have a nice day.

![IqyjSgG.png](https://i.imgur.com/IqyjSgG.png)What do you mean, rejected?!

![0e2nQNy.png](https://i.imgur.com/0e2nQNy.png)Rejected: Verb. Past tense. To dismiss as inadequate, inappropriate, or not to oneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s taste.

![MvKrAVh.png](https://i.imgur.com/MvKrAVh.png)But I aced the simulator!

![0e2nQNy.png](https://i.imgur.com/0e2nQNy.png)You crashed it into the ground. Twice.

![IqyjSgG.png](https://i.imgur.com/IqyjSgG.png)The aerodynamics model is wrong!

![Y45BrAy.png](https://i.imgur.com/Y45BrAy.png)ITÃ¢â‚¬â„¢S A MUN LANDER! THERE ARE NO AERODYNAMICS!

![Pe9ZQqN.png](https://i.imgur.com/Pe9ZQqN.png)ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a matter of opinion.

![igq1QU5.png](https://i.imgur.com/igq1QU5.png)No. It isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t. And your application is still denied.

* * *

***Aug. 17, Year 244***

***2:49 pm KST***

***Kerbal Space Center***

![shPmlaH.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/shPmlaH.jpg)

*From left to right: Jebediah Kerman, Bill Kerman*

![6wTPuHO.png](https://i.imgur.com/6wTPuHO.png)Well, so now what?

![MvKrAVh.png](https://i.imgur.com/MvKrAVh.png)This. IsnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t. Over.

![wZFy0LZ.png](https://i.imgur.com/wZFy0LZ.png)Actually, Jeb, it is.

![RTgTAp4.png](https://i.imgur.com/RTgTAp4.png)Hmmph.

![DWa6hdB.png](https://i.imgur.com/DWa6hdB.png)Well, maybe we could watch the rocket launch?

![EqQpJJa.png](https://i.imgur.com/EqQpJJa.png)What rocket launch?

![52B7qtm.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/52B7qtm.jpg)

![DWa6hdB.png](https://i.imgur.com/DWa6hdB.png)That rocket launch.

![QQt4LE9.png](https://i.imgur.com/QQt4LE9.png)Oh.

![DWa6hdB.png](https://i.imgur.com/DWa6hdB.png)It takes off tomorrow. Do you want to stay and see it?

![tjcOSql.png](https://i.imgur.com/tjcOSql.png)WhoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s aboard it?

![DWa6hdB.png](https://i.imgur.com/DWa6hdB.png)Nobody. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s an unmanned test flight.

![QQt4LE9.png](https://i.imgur.com/QQt4LE9.png)So no oneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s on it.

![O6AX3cL.png](https://i.imgur.com/O6AX3cL.png)No oneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s on it.

![3x3C2Sj.png](https://i.imgur.com/3x3C2Sj.png)No oneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s on it!

![O6AX3cL.png](https://i.imgur.com/O6AX3cL.png)Yes. No oneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s on it.

![ZPWGors.png](https://i.imgur.com/ZPWGors.png)***NO ONE IS ON IT!***

![O6AX3cL.png](https://i.imgur.com/O6AX3cL.png)...Yes...

![ZPWGors.png](https://i.imgur.com/ZPWGors.png)***WE'RE GOING TO SPACE TODAY BILL! WE'RE GOING TO SPACE TODAY!***

* * *

***Aug. 18, Year 244***

***3:02 am KST***

***Launch Pad, Kerbal Space Center***

![LvEkRdM.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/LvEkRdM.jpg)

![6wTPuHO.png](https://i.imgur.com/6wTPuHO.png)YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re sure about this?

![3x3C2Sj.png](https://i.imgur.com/3x3C2Sj.png)IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m sure about this.

![aZFMji1.png](https://i.imgur.com/aZFMji1.png)If you say soÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

![vaMqYED.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/vaMqYED.jpg)

![mzbdhVe.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/mzbdhVe.jpg)

![jQDZw2F.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/jQDZw2F.jpg)

![aNmvSu6.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/aNmvSu6.jpg)

![tjcOSql.png](https://i.imgur.com/tjcOSql.png)Take my hand and donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t look down!

![KPaE9Os.png](https://i.imgur.com/KPaE9Os.png)OkayÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

![xkezZhp.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/xkezZhp.jpg)

![3x3C2Sj.png](https://i.imgur.com/3x3C2Sj.png)Here we areÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ The cargo bay. They wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be able to detect us in here.

![6oGb5H9.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/6oGb5H9.jpg)

![tjcOSql.png](https://i.imgur.com/tjcOSql.png)Okay, IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m in. CÃ¢â‚¬â„¢mon, Bill.

![KPaE9Os.png](https://i.imgur.com/KPaE9Os.png)Oh jeez...

![tjcOSql.png](https://i.imgur.com/tjcOSql.png)Take it nice and slow, and *donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t look down*.

![PgzO6iL.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/PgzO6iL.jpg)

![KPaE9Os.png](https://i.imgur.com/KPaE9Os.png)donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t look down donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t look down donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t look down donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t look down donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t look down

![3smur0k.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/3smur0k.jpg)

![Akydgpn.png](https://i.imgur.com/Akydgpn.png)**I LOOKED DOWN**

![RTgTAp4.png](https://i.imgur.com/RTgTAp4.png)**WHAT DID I JUST SAY?**

![Akydgpn.png](https://i.imgur.com/Akydgpn.png)**I LOOKED DOWN**

![IqyjSgG.png](https://i.imgur.com/IqyjSgG.png)**I TOLD YOU TO NOT LOOK DOWN, AND WHAT DID YOU DO?!**

![Akydgpn.png](https://i.imgur.com/Akydgpn.png)**I LOOKED DOWN**

![IqyjSgG.png](https://i.imgur.com/IqyjSgG.png)**JUST GET IN THE FREAKING CHAIR**

![Akydgpn.png](https://i.imgur.com/Akydgpn.png)**I LOOKED DOWN**

![RTgTAp4.png](https://i.imgur.com/RTgTAp4.png)...

![Akydgpn.png](https://i.imgur.com/Akydgpn.png)**OKAY.**

![RTgTAp4.png](https://i.imgur.com/RTgTAp4.png)...

![aZFMji1.png](https://i.imgur.com/aZFMji1.png)<sub>...I looked downÃ¢â‚¬Â¦</sub>

![15sWVyU.png](https://i.imgur.com/15sWVyU.png)

![aZFMji1.png](https://i.imgur.com/aZFMji1.png)<sub>...I'm sorryÃ¢â‚¬Â¦</sub>

![6hYF1wg.png](https://i.imgur.com/6hYF1wg.png)

![H9Q6zzW.png](https://i.imgur.com/H9Q6zzW.png)<sub>...It wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t happen again.Ã¢â‚¬Â¦</sub>

* * *

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> The use of the Kerbal sprites is amusing.
> (Kerbal Sprite Program would be a cool thing to make. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

Yeah, I felt that the dialogue would be easier to read and more entertaining in this format, so I threw together some pixel art. I took inspiration from Lizard Wizard's Fallout 3 LP.

I could upload the sprites I've made so far if anyone's interested. As more characters enter the story, I'll need to keep making more. ![lWQrix2.png](https://i.imgur.com/lWQrix2.png)

***Aug. 18, Year 244***

***1:13 pm KST***

***Spaceplane Ã¢â‚¬Å“AureliusÃ¢â‚¬Â, Low Kerbin Orbit***

![TQEizRm.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TQEizRm.jpg)

*Jebediah Kerman in the cockpit of the Aurelius spaceplane*

![DWa6hdB.png](http://i.imgur.com/DWa6hdB.png)So whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s our plan now?

![tjcOSql.png](http://i.imgur.com/tjcOSql.png)We have a ship and weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re in space. All we need now is a destination and some supplies.

![O6AX3cL.png](http://i.imgur.com/O6AX3cL.png)But wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t they go looking for their missing ship?

![tjcOSql.png](http://i.imgur.com/tjcOSql.png)ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s an experimental ship, remember? They go missing all the time. They wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t make a big deal out of it.

![aZFMji1.png](http://i.imgur.com/aZFMji1.png)I hope youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re right.

"Hey, Jeb - how does this thing fly anyway?"

"Modern technology, William."

"Woaah."

I like it - have some fully full-on rep points! Bonus rep if you work in flight controller Rufus Kerman somewhere in the story. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

***Aug. 18, Year 244*** ***2:07 pm KST*** ***LKOS-2, Low Kerbin Orbit*** ![Bcnt5Xb.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/Bcnt5Xb.jpg) *LKOS-2* ![RuLE731.png](https://i.imgur.com/RuLE731.png)*Control, this is LKOS-2.* ![yEFU93i.png](https://i.imgur.com/yEFU93i.png)*Go ahead, LKOS-2.* ![RuLE731.png](https://i.imgur.com/RuLE731.png)*WeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ ahÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ have a visual on an unidentified craft at a distance of about one kilometer.* ![OlSH23r.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/OlSH23r.jpg) *View from LKOS-2 Cupola Module* ![yEFU93i.png](https://i.imgur.com/yEFU93i.png)*Can you send us a picture?* ![RuLE731.png](https://i.imgur.com/RuLE731.png)*Sending picture.* ![7TPgLiT.png](https://i.imgur.com/7TPgLiT.png) *Processed SSTV image* * * * ***Aug. 18, Year 244*** ***2:08 pm KST*** ***Undisclosed Location*** ![GTgVvIj.png](https://i.imgur.com/GTgVvIj.png) *From left to right: Admiral Gareth, Hydroxide representative, and some unnamed extras* ![34BdxqM.png](https://i.imgur.com/34BdxqM.png)This is a really big deal. ![op8tbob.png](https://i.imgur.com/op8tbob.png)Indeed. First a ship goes missing, then it reappears next to a space station. SomethingÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not right here. ![zECfZx5.png](https://i.imgur.com/zECfZx5.png)So whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the plan? ![op8tbob.png](https://i.imgur.com/op8tbob.png)*LKOS-2, can you patch me through to that ship?* ![RuLE731.png](https://i.imgur.com/RuLE731.png)*Roger. Patching you through.* ![aswY7oE.png](https://i.imgur.com/aswY7oE.png)*Unidentified contact, please identify yourself.* ![yEFU93i.png](https://i.imgur.com/yEFU93i.png)*Ã¢â‚¬Â¦* ![aswY7oE.png](https://i.imgur.com/aswY7oE.png)*Repeat: unidentified contact, please identify yourself.* ![yEFU93i.png](https://i.imgur.com/yEFU93i.png)^*Ah crap, what do we-*^Shut up! I got this! ![aswY7oE.png](https://i.imgur.com/aswY7oE.png)*I know you can hear me! Identify yourself at once!* ![yEFU93i.png](https://i.imgur.com/yEFU93i.png)*AhÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ This isÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ umÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Commander CommÃ¢â‚¬Â¦anderÃ¢â‚¬Â¦son. Commander Commanderson, requesting permission to dock withÃ¢â‚¬Â¦* umÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ LKOS-2, right? ^*Dude! They can still hear us!*^ Okay, okay! *Requesting permission to dock with LKOS-2.* ![aswY7oE.png](https://i.imgur.com/aswY7oE.png)*Denied! That ship is property of the Hydroxide Corporation! Surrender immediately!* ![yEFU93i.png](https://i.imgur.com/yEFU93i.png)^*I told you that wouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t-*^Shut up! I still got this! *We ahÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ have Ã¢â‚¬Ëœthe deviceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ on board. Evacuate the station or we will activate it.* ![aswY7oE.png](https://i.imgur.com/aswY7oE.png)*Do you expect me to-* ![34BdxqM.png](https://i.imgur.com/34BdxqM.png)Admiral, if I could have a wordÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ ![op8tbob.png](https://i.imgur.com/op8tbob.png)Make it quick. ![XW4z22R.png](https://i.imgur.com/XW4z22R.png)(whispers) ![rCKBZzG.png](https://i.imgur.com/rCKBZzG.png)Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ ![HtE6QLx.png](https://i.imgur.com/HtE6QLx.png)Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ ![op8tbob.png](https://i.imgur.com/op8tbob.png)YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve got to be kidding me. ![uZimLNt.png](https://i.imgur.com/uZimLNt.png)Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ ![aswY7oE.png](https://i.imgur.com/aswY7oE.png)*LKOS-2, follow all directions given to you by the unidentified craft.* ![RuLE731.png](https://i.imgur.com/RuLE731.png)*Are you being serious?* ![aswY7oE.png](https://i.imgur.com/aswY7oE.png)*(sigh) Unfortunately, yes.* ![RuLE731.png](https://i.imgur.com/RuLE731.png)*If you say so. Evacuating the station.* ![yEFU93i.png](https://i.imgur.com/yEFU93i.png)See? --!WARNING: DANGEROUSLY LOQUACIOUS TEXT WALL DETECTED!--

Sorry for all the delays! Because of 1.0, I'm waiting on a couple of mods to update. Additionally, the next episode was supposed to have several new ships which took a rather long time to build (which are incompatible with 1.0 because OF COURSE THEY F---ING ARE), and was to introduce a female character. Because she looks nothing like Valentina, I may need to wait a bit longer for TextureReplacer in order to show her face in non-sprite form.

I was debating whether or not to rename her "Valentina", but doing so would result in an unintentional pun so groan-inducing it was preemptively banned in seven states for humanitarian and ethical reasons. As a result, I am still unsure how to work Val into the plot in a way that both makes sense and isn't a minor cameo.

In the meantime, I think I will make a short episode to help establish the characters and give some exposition.

I'm trying not to make this into a super-serious military fanfic, but I fear that it is heading that way regardless. Let me know if it ever needs to lighten up a bit!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T16:56:18Z" title="05/03/2015 04:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by ninenineninefour**
